Package gods_and_mages_engine.Items

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Accessory
    Used for equipable items that add a Trait to the player character
    Armor
    Used for equipable items that modify the player character's defense value
    BaseItem
    Super class for all item classes, to implement shared shared fields and methods.
    EquipableItem
    Super class for all items that can be equipped to enhance the player character.
    InventoryItem
    Stores a BaseItem object along with the quantity of the item in the player character's inventory.
    KeyItem
    Used for items that cannot be removed from player inventory by normal means, nor multiples added.
    RecoveryItem
    Used for items which alter current hit points and/or mana points of a LivingCreature
    UsableItem
    Used for items that can used from the in-game inventory
    Weapon
    Used for equipable items that modify the attack power attribute of the player character
